entries.text: {'domain': 'Mental Well-being', 'warning': 'Rushing through life or tasks, even positive ones, can indicate underlying mental distress.', 'generalized': 'Haste, particularly in situations where deliberation is expected, can be a symptom of anxiety or lack of focus.'}

source.book: Cioran, E. M. - Trouble With Being Born (Seaver, 2011)

entries.text: {'domain': 'Creative Process', 'warning': 'Over-reliance on established forms or traditions can stifle genuine artistic endurance.', 'generalized': 'Creative work that lacks authentic engagement or fails to connect deeply with its subject may lack lasting impact.'}

source.book: Cioran, E. M. - Trouble With Being Born (Seaver, 2011)

entries.text: {'domain': 'Communication & Relationships', 'warning': "Dismissing or ignoring the simple, profound truths conveyed by everyday language (like 'taking its course') can lead to missed understanding.", 'generalized': 'Neglecting the wisdom contained in straightforward, common expressions can result in superficial comprehension.'}

source.book: Cioran, E. M. - Trouble With Being Born (Seaver, 2011)

aggregated_from.book: Cioran, E. M. - Trouble With Being Born (Seaver, 2011)
